Sections.Text: The darkness beneath Tyree Sanitorium is banished, the vampiric denizens destroyed.
The Duchess Orlac might have dissolved in the light, or might have slipped away in the shadows, but her lair is cleansed.
Plans for the Museum of Occult Antiquities can now proceed, transfroming what was once a house of horror into an institute of learning.
The next phase of the house's storied existence is about to begin, may it be a beacon of wisdom to all who visit it, lured in by promises of the once-dark secrets now laid bare in the light.
